name: TRPG Replayer
description:
A simple tool to replay your TRPG sessions, here you can open your logs from your favorite TRPG platfrom ( only CCFOLIA supported for now ) and replay them as if you were enjoying the session again. 
 Developed by: RONI github@ronniechoyy
